## Utils.ValidationHelpers.verifyIsWellFormed() method

Determines if a supplied `unknown` is a well-formed representation of the tag validated by these helpers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
verifyIsWellFormed(from: unknown, context?: TC): Result<T>;
```

**Returns:**

Result&lt;T&gt;

`Success` with the validated value, or `Failure` with details if an error occurs.
